attributes.action: Stop NHS Staff paying £120 Fee to NMC for 2020 &review to scrap at a later date
attributes.additional_details:
We would like to ask for an immediate stop to the fees for all NHS members for 2020 and a refund for those who have already made payment.
Everyone else is getting a helping hand from the government to some extent At the moment so this would be a helpful gesture of gratitude towards all the people helping deal with this unprecedented situation. 
Then to be reviewed at a later date to scrap this completely.
attributes.background: Not only are NHS staff putting their lives at risk daily in the current situation but they are paying £120 to NMC for the privilege to do so. It’s absolutely shocking!! At a time this country is asking the individuals in the NHS to go above and beyond this payment should be cancelled for 2020.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307399

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
